Doak established several other Southwest Conference records that still stand. <ref>http://www.heisman.com/winners/d-walker48.html</ref> ==Rivalries== *In the [[Battle for the Iron Skillet]], SMU tied Texas Christian 7-7. *In the Mayorâs Cup, SMU defeated Rice 33-7.
